item.title: Negligence in testosterone replacement therapy could trigger deadly polycythemia
item.description: If you or a family member has developed polycythemia, particularly while undergoing testosterone replacement therapy (TRT), you may have questions about whether your medical care was appropriate. Polycythemia, a blood disorder where thereâ€™s an excess of red blood cells, requires careful management. Blood work including a high red blood cell count, elevated hematocrit, and increased hemoglobin can be warning signs of this potentially life-threatening condition.
